query.value:

FROM CompSuite__Employee__c
WHERE LastModifiedDate >= '@{activity('get watermark').output.firstRow.highValue}'

0)},
"Merge Activity - Update" :@{if(

}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [SupplierName]
      ,[Supplier Number]
      ,[SupplierType]
      ,[Location]
      ,[EAN #]
      ,[AuditPerfom]
      ,case when [ActualAuditDate] like '%Not done moved%' then null else [ActualAuditDate] end as [ActualAuditDate]
      ,[AuditDurationDays]
      ,[LeadAuditorName]
      ,case when [Audit Team] = 'NA' then null else [Audit Team] end as [Audit Team]
      ,[AuditType]
      ,case when [Findings_Critical]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Critical] end as [Findings_Critical]
      ,case when [Findings_Major]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Major] end as [Findings_Major]
      ,case when [Findings_Moderate]  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Moderate] end as [Findings_Moderate]
      ,case when [Findings_Observ]	  = 'NA' then null else [Findings_Observ] end as [Findings_Observ]
      ,case when [AuditResults] = 'NA' then null else [AuditResults] end as [AuditResults]
      ,case when [AuditorScore] = 'NA' then null else [AuditorScore] end as [AuditorScore]
  FROM [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Calc_Suppliers_Audit_Activities_Followup]

source.name: Date of sending SCAR to supplier

sink.name: Date of sending SCAR to supplier

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	   case when [NCR #] = 'n/a' then null else [NCR #] end [NCRNo] 
      ,[Supplier Name] as SupplierName
      ,[Supplier's No.] as SupplierNo
      ,case when [Part Description] = 'n/a' then null else [Part Description] end PartDescription
      ,[PN]
      ,case when [MRB # / Ref] = 'n/a' then null else [MRB # / Ref] end MRBNo
      ,case when [Description of deviation] = 'n/a' then null else [Description of deviation] end as [DescriptionofDeviation]
      ,case when [Date of sending SCAR to supplier] = 'n/a' then null else [Date of sending SCAR to supplier] end [ScarSendingDate]
      ,case when [Y/M (trend)] = 'n/a' then null else [Y/M (trend)] end as Trend
      ,case when [Allowed return date] = 'n/a' then null else [Allowed return date] end as [AllowedReturnDate]
      ,case when [Date of Reminder] = 'n/a' then null else [Date of Reminder] end as ReminderDate
      ,case when [Date of SCAR Return]  in ('n/a','NA') then null else [Date of SCAR Return] end as ScarReturningDate
      ,case when [SCAR Approval Date] = 'n/a' then null else [SCAR Approval Date] end as [ScarApprovalDate]
      ,case when [Effectiveness Results] = 'n/a' then null else [Effectiveness Results] end as [EffectivenessResults]
      ,case when [Effectiveness Checking Date] = 'n/a' then null else [Effectiveness Checking Date] end as [EffectivenessCheckingDate]
      ,case when [Closing Date] = 'n/a' then null else [Closing Date] end as [ClosingDate]
      ,[Status]
      ,[Comments]
FROM [ScoreCards].[Mrr_Calc_ScarLog]

select YEAR(ScarSendingDate) as 'Year', DATEPART(WEEK,ScarSendingDate) as 'Week' , SupplierName,SupplierNo,PartDescription,PN,MRBNo,Descriptionofdeviation,ScarSendingDate,
AllowedReturnDate,ReminderDate,ScarReturningDate

 from ScoreCards.Mrr_ScarLog
 where YEAR(ScarSendingDate)>='2016'
